item.title: JTOpen The Open Source version of the IBM Toolbox for Java
item.description: JTOpen links https://gist.github.com/phpdave/52d6d8f135181a042901b2918141f82a#file-zdocumentation-md Setting up a jdbc connection to a Free Public test DB2 for i # https://godzillai5.wordpress.com/2016/08/20/db2-for-i-in-the-cloud-connecting-to-pub400-via-jdbc-in-netbeans/ Modifying a JDBC connection to allow CrUD features of Netbeans # https://godzillai5.wordpress.com/2016/08/21/jdbc-jt400-setting-to-get-crud-and-show-sql-features-added-in-netbeans-with-ibm-db2-for-i/
